com.itko.lisaint

Class CompInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itko.lisaint.LisaCollector
      • com.itko.lisaint.CompInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransInfo

    public class CompInfo
extends LisaCollector
    This class contains the component-level information that Lisa enables servers to report and for Lisa test case authors to access. Like its subclass the TransInfo, system under test component authors should access the write and read methods here to report important status and make commands known to the test case. Test case authors will use the read-only methods to respond to the status and commands. These are already handled in the Filter classes that are specific to each system type tested.

    • Method Detail

      • newChildComp

        public CompInfo newChildComp(java.lang.String name)
        This is how child-components are created. The overal TransInfo object and its own child CompInfo objects themselves can have children. Therefore, nesting is as arbitrarily deep as you need. Call this method to create a child component execution scope and set that scope as the current component scope of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        name - used to identify this component
        Returns:
        a CompInfo object that represents this child scope

      • getCurrentComp

        public CompInfo getCurrentComp()
        Will return the current execution scope of this transaction. The last created scope, either from Integrator.startTransaction(), or from this class' newChildComp() that has not been signaled as finished() will be returned. For example, you start a new transaction (t), then create a child (c1), then that child creates a child (c2). Calling this method on c2 will return c2. Calling this method on c1 will return c2. Calling this method on t will return c1. If you then call c2.finished() to notify that this child scope is now done, then calling this method on c1 and t will return c1.
        Returns:
        the current child execution scope as a CompInfo object

      • getAllChildResponses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllChildResponses()
        This method is used to build a flat list of responses from all the decendents of this component info object.
        Parameters:
        comp - the comp to add the sub responses for.
        list - the list to add them to.
